nodes.text: The Urch incident was a confrontation that arose out of a Chiss Ascendancy diplomatic mission to the planet Urch, capital of the Urchiv-ki, with whom the Ascendancy had a treaty. The Ascendancy was asked to send Ambassador Boadil'par'gasoi to Urch, and the syndics Mitth'urf'ianico and Irizi'stal'mustro chose Admiral Ar'alani's Vigilant, along with Senior Captain Mitth'raw'nuruodo, for the mission to prevent Thrawn from visiting the Lioaoin Regime as part of his investigations into the conquests of the Nikardun Destiny. However, the invitation was a trap—the Urchiv-ki had been subjugated by the Nikardun, refusing to allow the Chiss to land. Thrawn noticed the presence of Lioaoin vessels, as well as a Nikardun frigate. The Vigilant evaded the Urchiv-ki and Nikardun ships, escaping into hyperspace.

Due to the Lioaoin presence at Urch, Ambassador Ilparg demanded that the Vigilant visit the Lioaoin heartworld for an explanation. Upon the Chiss arrival at the heartworld, the Lioaoi denied involvement, while a Nikardun Battle Dreadnought approached the Vigilant. Thrawn identified himself to the Lioaoi, sparking a brief reaction from several Lioaoin gunboats, allowing him to deduce that the Lioaoi were allied with the Nikardun and had standing orders regarding him.
